alert.note: Alert for Greater Lake Tahoe Area (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 04 at 2:16AM PST until January 07 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Reno
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches for Truckee and Lake Tahoe Communities with 10 to 20 inches above 7000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph in lower elevations and 80 to 100 mph over Sierra Ridges. * WHERE...Greater Lake Tahoe Area. * WHEN...From Saturday morning through Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible due to whiteout conditions. Very strong winds could cause damage to trees and power lines.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. Be prepared for long travel delays or adjust your travel plans to avoid periods of heavy snow and whiteout conditions.
